column35: IBM Consulting is instrumental in this deal by utilizing IBM Cloud Satellite as part of the application modernization factory. column35: Leading business case and business process definition for the technology

1. To support Anthem's mission and business goals on building a secure digital platform powered by modern technologies that is open and fully integrated with Hybrid Cloud Consumption Model to deliver 1) cost saving, 2) minimize risks through a comprehensive co-created / co-design transformation program  

2. IBM’s approach complies with people, process and technology to deliver the end-to-end transformation solution across application, infrastructure, managed services, and target operating model that leverages AI to automate and optimize business processes

Our Consulting and Technology proposed transformation roadmap delivers an immediately cost saving in 2022 through the following project strategies: 
- Platform Optimization (Wazi as a Service & Cloud Object Storage)
- Application Modernization and Optimization
- DevOps Transformation
- COBOL Upgrade

2. IBM’s approach complies with people, process and technology to deliver the end-to-end transformation solution across application, infrastructure, managed services, and target operating model that leverages AI to automate and optimize business processes

Our Consulting and Technology proposed transformation roadmap delivers an immediately cost saving in 2022 through the following project strategies: 
- Platform Optimization (Wazi as a Service & Cloud Object Storage)
- Application Modernization and Optimization
- DevOps Transformation
- COBOL Upgrade

column10: Maximo Implementation for Electric Distribution - Phase 1
column35:
IBM Consulting leveraged the relationship it has built with National Grid’s C-Suite and leadership to present IBM’s POC on Enterprise Asset Management which has laid the foundation for follow-up discussions on Maximo Application Suite as a core EAM and Analytics solutions. IBM Consulting and IBM Technology group will continue to work together to present the case of how IBM software and consulting can help accelerate their transformational journey. We will continue to sell solutions built on the IBM technology stack, implemented and managed by IBM Consulting and IBM Cloud Delivery Services.
This opportunity is the initial phase of a multi-year transformational program for National Grid to become a digital utility of the future. The anticipated value of the overall program based on the National Grid's budget is more than 30 million spread across 2 - 3 years.

IBM Consulting has also been instrumental in helping the National Grid Gas business implement Maximo 7.6.2 on IBM Cloud with IBM cloud delivery services leading to more than 25M revenue for IBM Technology and Cloud and Consulting last two years. 

I am attaching the pdf the joint (Technology and Consulting) team presented to National Grid Electric CIO and his team on Enterprise Asset Management Strategy last week as evidence. We do have a follow session scheduled in a couple of weeks.
